org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.pluginse

Class MasterAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.pluginse.MasterAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DtoHandler

    public class MasterAPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements DtoHandler
    Master API Create/Delete virtual reader based on Commands received from Slave API Propagates Commands to SlaveAPI from virtual reader API Init this API with a DtoSender of your implementation. Link this API to one your DtoHandler.
